I am pleased to share that I have successfully completed my internship at Feynn Labs! This experience has been a remarkable journey, allowing me to delve deeper into the world of data science and machine learning.

During my internship, I had the privilege to:
-Implement advanced data analytics techniques using Python, Pandas, and NumPy.
-Develop and optimize machine learning models for predictive analysis.
-Conduct data preprocessing and create compelling visualizations with Matplotlib and Seaborn.
-Collaborate with a talented team on model optimization through hyperparameter tuning and cross-validation.
-Document project processes meticulously, adhering to industry standards.
A heartfelt thank you to my mentors Mr.Sanjay Basumatary and the incredible team at Feynn Labs for their unwavering support and guidance. Your mentorship has been instrumental in my growth, and I am excited to bring these new skills and insights to my future endeavors.

Hi everyone,

I am excited to share the project Il worked on during my virtual internship at Feynn Labs under the guidance of Mr. Sanjay Basumatary. The project is titled "Market Segmentation: Identifying the Ideal Customer for Electric Vehicles in India."

Target:
The aim was to identify distinct buyer segments using psychographic, behavioral, and socio-economic characteristics through the 'perceived benefits-attitude-intention' framework. This segmentation is essential for effectively promoting EV adoption in emerging markets.

Significance:
Market segmentation is crucial for advancing EV adoption in emerging markets. The identified segments provide valuable insights for shaping policies, strategies, and marketing efforts to accelerate the transition towards electric mobility.

Results:
Through our analysis, we identified three distinct sets of young consumer groups labeled as â€˜Conservatives,â€™ â€˜Indifferents,â€™ and â€˜Enthusiasts,â€™ which are deemed to be budding EV buyers. These segments offer valuable guidance for scholars and policymakers to encourage EV adoption in the backdrop of an emerging sustainable transport market.

With this project, I have successfully completed my internship as a Machine Learning Intern at Feynn Labs. I would like to thank our guide, Mr. Sanjay Basumatary, for this amazing opportunity. Additionally, I extend my gratitude to my peers Nithya Johny,Sri Deekshith Labb and Rishita Pitta 
for their valuable feedback and suggestions.

Here's the link to my project:
https://lnkd.in/dVmA42SK
